div.p: Starting with ActiveMQ 5.8.0 Jolokia is bundled which provides a RESTful interface to ActiveMQ's JMX capabilities. An open source third party tool that connects via Jolokia is hawt.io, an HTML-5 web console with an ActiveMQ plugin that is at least worth being familiar with as ActiveMQ and hawt.io share developers.
